title: Deliuerance from the graue A sermon preached at Saint Maries Spittle in London, on Wednesday in Easter weeke last, March 28. 1627. By Tho. Goffe, Batchelor of Diuinitie, lately student of Christ-Church in Oxford.
author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by G. Purslowe] for Ralph Mab,
